entities.name: dudley
entities.description: Dudley is the son of Uncle Vernon and Aunt Petunia. He is mentioned as asking his aunt if his father has gone mad.

entities.name: aunt petunia
entities.description: Aunt Petunia is the wife of Uncle Vernon and mother of Dudley. She is mentioned as being asked by Dudley about her husband's sanity.

entities.name: uncle vernon
entities.description: Uncle Vernon is the father of Dudley and husband of Aunt Petunia. He is mentioned as parking his car at the coast and locking everyone inside.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a boy who is celebrating his eleventh birthday. He is mentioned as thinking about his upcoming birthday.

entities.name: the great humberto
entities.description: The Great Humberto is an event that Dudley wants to watch on television. It is mentioned as being on tonight.

relationships.description: Uncle Vernon is the father of Dudley.
Harry and Dudley are friends, as they share a birthday.
